item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, January 15, 2025 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. 100x defect tolerance: How we solved the yield problem (44 points | 22 comments)
2. Why is Cloudflare Pages' bandwidth unlimited? (332 points | 197 comments)
3. Ropey – A UTF8 text rope for manipulating and editing large text (166 points | 70 comments)
4. dnSpyEx: .NET debugger and assembly editor (41 points | 2 comments)
5. Why the weak nuclear force is short range (279 points | 119 comments)
6. Sweden brings more books and handwriting practice back to its schools (2023) (245 points | 180 comments)
7. I have made the decision to disband Hindenburg Research (52 points | 12 comments)
8. Lambda Calculus in 383 Bytes (2022) (212 points | 32 comments)
9. Modern JavaScript for Django developers (134 points | 81 comments)
10. Empirical Health (YC S23) is hiring interns to build data-driven primary care ( | hide)
11. Show HN: I made a tool to save multimedia from various platforms (54 points | 26 comments)
12. Google is making AI in Gmail and Docs free, but raising the price of Workspace (91 points | 125 comments)
13. Code reviews: A success story (26 points | 20 comments)
14. Show HN: I built a fair alternative to Product Hunt for indie makers (73 points | 22 comments)
15. Scheduled tasks in ChatGPT (64 points | 31 comments)
16. Sutton Hoo and Syria: Anglo-Saxons who served in the Byzantine army? (12 points | 1 comment)
17. Arnold's Cat (2018) (22 points | 4 comments)
18. Sky-scanning complete for Gaia (132 points | 34 comments)
19. Ludum Dare 2025 is cancelled (35 points | 6 comments)
20. TikTok preparing for U.S. shut-off on Sunday (435 points | 1277 comments)
21. Train faster static embedding models with sentence transformers (28 points | 1 comment)
22. US will ban cancer-linked Red Dye No. 3 in cereal and other foods (203 points | 359 comments)
23. Nobody cares (189 points | 200 comments)
24. Imaging mounted disk volumes under duress (2021) (42 points | 5 comments)
25. Homomorphic encryption in iOS 18 (313 points | 158 comments)
26. Natrium 'advanced nuclear' power plant wins Wyoming permit (44 points | 27 comments)
27. Take the pedals off the bike (391 points | 400 comments)
28. (Right-Nulled) Generalised LR Parsing (47 points | 1 comment)
29. TSMC begins producing 4-nanometer chips in Arizona (338 points | 307 comments)
30. A marriage proposal spoken in office jargon (339 points | 187 comments)
